name: MEMORYLAND WW DRESS
description: Composition:100% Polyester Length (UK 10):Knee 37 Sleeve:Elbow Pleats Wrap

reviews.name: Jani C
reviews.comment: This will be a dress is so comfortable! Although I bought it to travel, I think it will be used daily when I get back.

reviews.name: anonymous
reviews.comment: Such a fun, comfortable look for spring/summer! Great to wear to work or out to the wineries! Throw on a pair of sneakers or sandals and you're ready to go!

name: EARLY NIGHT EVENING WEAR DRESS
description: Composition:100% Polyester Length:Maxi  53 Long Sleeve Elbow Sleeve pleated Maxi Length Printed Side Zipper

reviews.name: Whitney J
reviews.comment: So pretty, delicate looking and covers beautifully! Very happy with my purchase!

name: BEAUTY DRESS
description: COMPOSITION:100% Polyester LENGTH:Maxi 53'' SLEEVE:Puff Sleeve  Square Neck Sleeve Elastic Side Zipper

reviews.name: Imev
reviews.comment: Length is perfect ! Bought in petite will be great to wear in warmer weather for casual evening out !

name: SUMMER CRAZE DRESS
description: COMPOSITION:100% Polyester LENGTH:Maxi Length - 51'' SLEEVE:Straps Adjustble Straps Back Top Body Smocked Front Top Open With Plastic Buttons Side Invisible Zipper Semi Fitted Solid Woven Fabric

reviews.name: anonymous
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this dress and am thinking of ordering the peach colour. I am a very tall woman and it comes to the floor my new favourite for summer.

reviews.name: Jamie V
reviews.comment: I like the material and the print, Had to shorten the length as I am 5'3 and would trip on it.

name: RIPPED WIDE LEG JEAN
description: Material composition :74% Cotton 26% Lycocell Length:In seam 27  Wide leg loost fit  Riipp

reviews.name: Caitlin C
reviews.comment: These Kicker jeans are my new favorite jeans! I'm 5' 5 150 lbs ordered size 10 and exchanged them for size 8. Just enough stretch to be comfortable, but not too much to stretch to baggy.

name: DENIM SKIRT
description: Material composition :74% Cotton 26% Lycocell Length:Short 16 Short Skirt 5 button fly  Ripped

reviews.name: anonymous , 2 days ago
reviews.comment: The best jeans I've bought in a long time! They're flattering and I got them on sale!

reviews.name: Maureen c , 5 days ago
reviews.comment: These fit nicely and look great!

name: MID WAIST DENIM PANT WITH RAW HEM
description: Material : 69% Telcel 28%Rayon 3%Spandex Length : Long Length With Raw hem

reviews.name: Sarah L , 12 days ago
reviews.comment: Great jeans. I'm 5 ft. 5 in. and the short length is perfect. They are comfortable. I just bought two new pair.

reviews.name: anonymous , 2 days ago
reviews.comment: Was very happy with my purchase! Wasn't sure on the size but they are a Perfect fit! Very nice quality pair of jeans, I'm sure they will last me a long time!
